input: Exercise improves health. Meditation calms the mind. Diet boosts energy.

Exercise improves health.

Nutrition is also essential for a healthy body and mind.

Meditation calms the mind and reduces stress levels.

A well-balanced diet provides the necessary fuel for optimal performance and bodily functions.

Diet boosts energy and supports overall physical well-being.
